Name: Blast Bangle
LongDescription: Absorbs damage from Water-type moves to restore HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Cyndaquil, Quilava, and Typhlosion.  You can get a Blast Bangle at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Typhlo-Gasp, a Typhlo-Fang, and a Typhlo-Seal. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
